actionParams.description: The identifier of the partner account
actionParams.name: partnerId

actionParams.description: The user's unique identifier in the partner's system
actionParams.name: userId

actionParams.description: The requested time (in seconds) before the generated KS expires (By default, a KS expires after 24 hours).
actionParams.name: expiry

description: Logs a user into a partner account with a partner ID, a partner user ID (puser), and a user password.
